Name: Let's Turn Pick-Up Beach to a Nudist Fucking Beach!
About the game: You are the owner of 'Beach House', a shop run on a pick-up beach. Your goal is to change this pick-up beach into your dream nudist fucking beach where girls walk around topless and nude, and where anyone can do lewd things whenever they want to. Spread rumors, ask your slutty fuck buddy to demonstrate plays, hold events, do lewd things yourself, and change the beach's mood to make your dreams come true. How to play 1 'Move' will be consumed when a pick-up or command is executed. You will move on to the next turn if your 'Move' reaches 0. Depending on the situation, each parameter will change accordingly, and your money will increase. Your goal is to reach 100% for the popularity of all plays. Note For Windows using languages other than Japanese, change the setting to Japanese by going to the control panel, select Region, and change it in the 'Language for non-Unicode programs'.
